abilities.name: Contemplation
abilities.description: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order

abilities.name: Awakening
abilities.description: If you've drawn 3 or more cards this turn, this can attack and gains +2/+2

body.raw:
# Four of Cups

Lost in contemplation, weighing options yet to be seen.

*"Sometimes the best action is patient reflection."*
